post.body: I would consider calling in an air lift personally...
My 4 yr old did that exact thing in Target this week... he was just checking to make sure nothing had "happened"... hilarious!
It depends on the news I suppose... but YES I find it annoying.
Here here, a Colts fan! You a transplanted Hoosier?
so how was your first bottle then? : )
Or obesity funding NY... not thinking price is much of a deterrent... i don't know of smokers NOT paying $30 a carton...
My 09 pledge: Lose more hair (Sadly one I know I'll nail).
Goodnight folks... (hard to follow this last tweet)... get home safe everyone!
That was sarcasm...
HA! Did you like my VM today??? : )
My 3-month old boy; cuteness personified. The odors he produces... not so much.
Have a great weekend all, we'll see you on the interwebs!
Father-in-law has Myasthenia Gravis (MG)... Know someone with this? it's a bitch! B-sugar and B-preasure is all jacked 2day... at hospital..
Introduce my friend, coworker and Twitter newbie @Chanel_jade ... I think she's a little lonely with only 2 followers...
FACTOIDS 3 & 4: I owned a pair of red and black parachute pants and my first concert was Men at Work... all I can say is I'm sorry.
Good read from iMedia Connection... "5 ways to achieve the big idea" http://bit.ly/SQug
Loving the low work levels today... makes the day go sloooow though...
FACTOID 2: I lived in Milan for 3 years... her name was Valentina. It didn't work out, but I had a blast!
FACTOID #1: I have 34 vertebrae (one extra lumbar). I hear "Hey, look at that guy with the freakishly long torso" a lot... not true at all.
I will be tweeting some nzink factoids today for you. I think it fair that you, as followers, know more about me... Hey, you're welcome : )
good morning all, and to all, a good morning... ghost town here at work today... you know, all those "sick" people...
I feel terrible and partly responsible for the Sun's struggle... Steve Blake is on my fantasy team... I'm sorry guys!
enough of twitter for now, time to watch the suns (i like twitter and all, but i'd rather not experience the game via lines of text...)
Ate a nice dinner with the fam and am playing with the boys before bedtime... homebody's delight! Suns game not until 8:30... (sigh)
The reality that the vacation is coming to a close is starting to sink in... bummer! I'm plugging my info into http://bit.ly/3Ncg3t
FINALLY saw Kung Fu Panda today... freaking brilliant.
Started out the year with a back ache : ( I still can't get the spooky images of Dick Clark out of my head. Creepy.
Thinking about making some Chambord Margaritas tonight to bring in the new year... mmmmm
sometimes i think my shoulders and arms will fuse together in the "working at computer" position and I'll walk around like Frankenstein
Bad call gift: Hungry Hungry Hippo
Just got back from a late showing of Valkyrie... quite good... my vote for "feel good movie of the year"... : )
Made the mistake of weighing myself... BIG mistake.
Just checked out @MrTweet, pretty handy! http://mrtweet.net?c=11!
Damn sam, I just made some awesome pasta sauce (sausage, red wine, garlic, onion, basil...) Now, ready for some Suns basketball!
Looking forward to lunching at Kona Grill... not to mention getting out of this house. I love it, but I've got to see some people!
Glorious vacation! Boys are watching Ghostbusters (Target discount rack)... I forgot how funny that movie was! Bill Murray is brilliant...
WordPress site for my Dad-in-law almost finished... booya! If you ever need a Transient Surge Suppression Device, let me know! : )
Could the Cardinals possibly miss MORE tackles on defense and special teams? When they show me some fundamentals, I'll start believing...
er, stopped following rather... I'd just rather get three tweets of more personal substance than 30 of misc. industry links... coffee time!
had to let a follower go... (large sigh) yea, just had to be done... just not a fan of getting 250 misc. links and RTs a day...
